pages.text: The Mining Dimension mimics the Overworld, but has some key differences.$(br2)$(l)No mobs spawn$() in the Mining Dimension unless they are $(o)linked to a structure$() such as a village or beehive.
To make up for the lack of spawns, you can use the $(thing)Summon Animals Tablet$() to find some creatures that would naturally spawn in that biome.
$(l)Hostile Mobs$() do not spawn here $(o)even from spawners$().$(br2)This may make some dungeons and structures easier than they would be in the Overworld.

$(l)Sleeping$() does not pass the night in the Mining Dimension. $(br2)Unlike other dimensions, your bed will not explode.$(br2)$(l)Due to the Fresh Generation$(), Nature's and Explorer's Compasses work accurately in this dimension!
